name: 10 Years After
description: “10 Years After” Is a survival based horror (Open World) Single Player Adventure ..........After the government rolled out a injection to the general public to stem the violence and quell the human emotion's things were going well ….....
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 5950 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 x64 Processor: Intel I5 2500K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7970 Storage: 3 GB available space
